Name: Swordfish Features Registry
Description: This registry defines the Swordfish features.

SNIA.Swordfish.Discovery.Description: Supports discovery of resources in a Swordfish system.

SNIA.Swordfish.EventNotification.Description: Supports the Swordfish Event Notification Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.LocalReplication.Description: Supports the local replication for block storage Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.RemoteReplication.Description: Supports the remote replication for block storage Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.MappingMasking.Description: Supports the Swordfish Block Mapping and Masking Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.CapacityManagement.Description: Supports the Swordfish Block Capacity Management Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.File.CapacityManagement.Description: Supports the Swordfish File Capacity Management Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.EnergyStar.Description: Supports the Swordfish EnergyStar for Storage Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.CoSDiscovery.Description: Supports Discovery requirements when using the Swordfish Class Of Service Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.CoSMappingMasking.Description: Supports Mapping and Masking Feature when using the Swordfish Class Of Service Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.Block.CoSLocalReplication.Description: Supports the local replication for block storage Feature when using the Swordfish Class Of Service Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.NVMeDrive.Description: Supports the Swordfish NVMe Drive Feature.

SNIA.Swordfish.NVMeDriveAdvancedFeatures.Description: Supports Advanced Features functionality for NVMe Drives.

SNIA.Swordfish.NVMeDriveEthernetAttach.Description: Supports Ethernet Attach functionality for NVMe Drives.
